column4: Hey guys-- I'm trying to log into my wireless network--- but tying in the correct key the "connect" button is greyed out
guys how do I force the connection?
The key is correct I just need to "connect" button to not be greyed (which is ridiculous that it's greyed out at all)
sudo iwconfig essid NAMEOFNETWORK wep KEY
you can man iwconfig or iwconfig --help for more details as well
yes, its encryption KEY though, but yes
anyone know how to force https://help.ubuntu.com/community/HardyUpgrades Step #5 from 6.06 to 8.04 since its not appearing as stated?
Just for clarification its-- sudo iwconfig essid [NETWORK NAME] wep [KEY]
but its encryption instead of wep
doing a man iwconfig (q to quit) and iwconfig --help gives you more connection options
anyone know how to force https://help.ubuntu.com/community/HardyUpgrades Step #5 from 6.06 to 8.04 since its not appearing as stated?
Hmmm strange it came out "unknown command "networkname""
you replace your network name with networkname
sudo iwconfig essid [network name] wep [encryption code]
change wep to encryption, but all else looks good (to check try iwconfig --help)
